participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Determined and imaginative, yet reflective about the passage of time.
participant_1.background: i have two grown children who never visit. i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Creative and introverted, with a tendency to escape into virtual worlds.
participant_2.background: i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i dye my hair every three months.

content.text: Hi there ! How are you doing ?
I would like to learn what you are busy with !
